about:
Hi! I'm a self-taught Web Designer/Developer with a degree in Industrial Design. Through academia, I learned the value of design when creating a product. I also learned that I enjoy bringing designs to life in the digital world with code. As a result, I decided to pursue this field which encompasses both design and development.

The past couple of years, I've been focusing solely in learning front-end technologies, but recently, I've been slowly delving into back-end technologies to reach my current goal of becoming a Full Stack Developer. I'm currently looking for an opportunity to work on a web application that would make use of my skills in front-end development, while exposing me to back-end development challenges as well.

list.name: HTML
list.description: Along with HTML, I'm also proficient with templating engines such as jade/pug for JavaScript and twig for PHP. They're great for building reusable components.

list.name: CSS
list.description: I'm quite proficient with CSS, though I usually use SCSS for most of my projects while using BEM for my naming system. I'm also familiar with Stylus, LESS, and postCSS.

list.name: JavaScript
list.description: I'm comfortable working with client-side JavaScript and creating automated workflows with gulp. I'm also currently learning server-side JavaScript as well as React.

list.name: PHP
list.description: My experience with PHP is mostly due to working with WordPress Sites, though I've recently been delving deeper into it.

list.name: Bash
list.description: I have a pretty basic understand of Bash which I mostly use to create shortcuts and basic scripts  which automates and speeds up my workflow.

list.name: Git
list.description: I messed up enough commits to learn to fix my mistakes :)

list.name: Continuous Deployment
list.description: I'm familiar with the concept and working with Jenkins though I don't have experience setting it up.

list.name: A/B Testing
list.description: I'm familiar with the concept and worked with tools like Optimizely to setup experiments.

company.name: ShopKeep
company.info: ShopKeep is a software development company working on a point of sale application for iOS devices that’s being used by over 20,000 small businesses.

achievements: I’m the lead developer for ShopKeep’s marketing site, www.shopkeep.com.
I also manage and maintain their ecommerce site, shop.shopkeep.com.
I developed the front-end of their gift card micro-site, www.ecardsystems.com/shopkeep.
I developed the front-end of their lead capture micro-site, www.possoftwareguide.com/find-your-pos.
I designed and developed landing pages.
I developed the new blog, www.shopkeep.com/blog.

company.name: Magnet Media
company.info: Magnet Media Films is a content marketing solutions industry leader who created stunning videos for clients such as Google, Microsoft and Good Technology.

achievements: I assisted the Art Director with Magnet Media’s personal branding as well as client projects.
I created visual assets for presentations and other marketing materials.
I redesigned and developed their marketing website.

company.name: Sign Facility
company.info: Sign Facility is a printing and signage company in downtown Jersey City with clients including Carlo’s Bakery, Mack Cali and John Hancock.

achievements: I was responsible for the design, prepress, production and production of the prints.
I also handled the digital press printers, laser cutter, vinyl cutter, and the flatbed printer for oversized printing.
I created personalized client print templates using HTML and CSS with a content management system called Online Printing Solutions owned by Electronics For Imaging.
